section.title: General
section.para: The UCC ubuntu mirror has been updated to the most recent version.

New official UCC images will be provided with UCC 1.0-rev3.
These images include all software updates up to UCC 1.0-rev3 and can be installed by installing the packages ucc-1.0-rev3-thinclient-image respectively ucc-1.0-rev3-desktop-image.

Installing or updating the UCC App automatically installs the new thinclient image ucc-1.0-rev3-thinclient-image.
See the UCC manual for detailed information about UCC image management.
